snippet: Rick Raemisch, whose predecessor was killed by an inmate who had been kept in solitary confinement, spent a night alone in a cell as part of a campaign against the practice.
abstract: Colorado's Corrections Department executive director Rick Raemisch, whose predecessor was killed by inmate who had been kept in solitary confinement, spends night alone in cell as part of campaign against practice.
lead_paragraph: Rick Raemisch, whose predecessor was killed by an inmate who had been kept in solitary confinement, spent a night alone in a cell as part of a campaign against the practice.

headline.main: After 20 Hours in Solitary, Colorado’s Prisons Chief Wins Praise
headline.print_headline: After 20 Hours in Solitary, Colorado’s Prisons Chief Wins Praise
